column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite tapas restaurants in the Chicago area. The potatoes with tomato aioli are outstanding
column2: but the best thing in my opinion was the paella. The paella option with multiple forms of delicious pork is to die for. I would say it's a must when coming here. To top it all off
column3: the flan was rich and dense
column4: some of the best flan I have ever had. Disclaimer: it is a lot thicker
column5: almost more of a dense custard
column6: so if texture is not for you
column7: maybe steer clear. All in all
